General.Name: HKScan Oyj A
General.Description: HKScan Oyj operates as a food company in Finland, Sweden, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Denmark, and Germany. It produce, sells, and markets pork, beef, poultry, and lamb products; and processed meats and convenience foods under the HK, Kariniemen, Via, Scan, Pärsons, and Rose brands to retail, food service, industry, and export sectors. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Turku, Finland. HKScan Oyj operates as a subsidiary of LSO Osuuskunta.
